array.string: Sundering Strike has a 50% chance to build 1 additional focus.
Sundering Strike has a 100% chance to build 1 additional focus.
Force Sweep has a 50% chance to lower the accuracy of affected targets by 5% for 18 seconds.
Force Sweep has a 100% chance to lower the accuracy of affected targets by 5% for 18 seconds.
Force Leap and Zealous Leap have a 33% chance to make the next Blade Storm activate without a focus cost.
Force Leap and Zealous Leap have a 66% chance to make the next Blade Storm activate without a focus cost.
Force Leap and Zealous Leap have a 99% chance to make the next Blade Storm activate without a focus cost.
Increases your melee and ranged defenses by 2% while in Soresu Form.
Increases your melee and ranged defenses by 4% while in Soresu Form.
Increases your melee and ranged defenses by 6% while in Soresu Form.
Reduces the focus cost of Riposte by 1 while Soresu Form is active.
Reduces the focus cost of Riposte by 2 while Soresu Form is active.
Reduces the focus cost of Hilt Strike and Freezing Force by 1.
Reduces the focus cost of Hilt Strike and Freezing Force by 2.
Riposte now increases melee and ranged defenses by 2% for 6.
Riposte now increases melee and ranged defenses by 4% for 12.
Riposte now increases melee and ranged defenses by 6% for 18.
Reduces all damage taken by 40% for 10.
Reduces the cooldown of Resolute by 15.
Reduces the cooldown of Resolute by 30.
Increases the damage dealt by Hilt Strike, Force Sweep and Cyclone Slash by 5%.
Increases the damage dealt by Hilt Strike, Force Sweep and Cyclone Slash by 10%.
Increases the damage dealt by Hilt Strike, Force Sweep and Cyclone Slash by 15%.

While in Soresu Form, parrying, deflecting, shielding or resisting an attack has a 25% chance to grant courage, reducing the focus cost of your next Blade Storm or Force Sweep by 1. Lasts 10 seconds and stacks up to 3 times.

While in Soresu Form, parrying, deflecting, shielding or resisting an attack has a 50% chance to grant courage, reducing the focus cost of your next Blade Storm or Force Sweep by 1. Lasts 10 seconds and stacks up to 3 times.
Reduces the cooldown of Challenging Call and Force Push by 7.5 seconds.
Reduces the cooldown of Challenging Call and Force Push by 15 seconds.
Force Stasis no longer needs to be channeled, applying its full effect over 3 seconds.
Bashes the target for (current weapon) kinetic damage, stunning it for 4. This ability generates a high amount of threat.
Force Leap now stuns the target for 2.
Blade Storm has a 50% chance to grant Blade Barrier, which absorbs a moderate amount of damage. Lasts 10 seconds.
Blade Storm has a 100% chance to grant Blade Barrier, which absorbs a moderate amount of damage. Lasts 20 seconds.
Increases the duration of Enure by 2 seconds. Increases elemental and internal damage reduction by 2.5%.
Increases the duration of Enure by 4 seconds. Increases elemental and internal damage reduction by 5%.
Increases the frequency at which Soresu Form can generate focus by 33.34. In addition, Cyclone Slash and Slash have a 1% chance to reduce the active cooldown of Combat Focus by ?.
Increases the frequency at which Soresu Form can generate focus by 66.68. In addition, Cyclone Slash and Slash have a 2% chance to reduce the active cooldown of Combat Focus by ?.
Increases the frequency at which Soresu Form can generate focus by 100.02. In addition, Cyclone Slash and Slash have a 3% chance to reduce the active cooldown of Combat Focus by ?.

Strikes the target with a powerful blow, dealing (current weapon) weapon damage and applying 3 stacks of armor reduction for (current weapon) seconds. Targets affected by 5 stacks of your armor reduction suffer 15 weapon damage instead.
Sundering Strike has a 50% chance to apply one additional stack of sunder armor.
Sundering Strike has a 100% chance to apply one additional stack of sunder armor.
Increases the damage dealt by Force Sweep by 10% and lowers its cooldown by 1.
Increases the damage dealt by Force Sweep by 20% and lowers its cooldown by 2.
Increases the damage dealt by Force Sweep by 30% and lowers its cooldown by 3.
Increases melee damage by 2% while in Shien and Shii-Cho forms.
Increases melee damage by 4% while in Shien and Shii-Cho forms.
Increases melee damage by 6% while in Shien and Shii-Cho forms.
Generates 2 Focus when stunned, slept or knocked down.
Generates 4 Focus when stunned, slept or knocked down.
Increases the accuracy of melee and Force attacks by 1%.
Increases the accuracy of melee and Force attacks by 2%.
Increases the accuracy of melee and Force attacks by 3%.
Whenever your movement is impaired, you gain a 5% bonus to your next melee ability that costs focus. This effect can stack up to 5 times and lasts 10 seconds.
Whenever your movement is impaired, you gain a 10% bonus to your next melee ability that costs focus. This effect can stack up to 5 times and lasts 10 seconds.
Force Leap has a 50% chance to grant Unremitting, reducing all damage taken by 20% and granting immunity to interrupts and all controlling effects for 4 seconds.
Force Leap has a 100% chance to grant Unremitting, reducing all damage taken by 20% and granting immunity to interrupts and all controlling effects for 4 seconds.

Enters an offensive lightsaber form, increasing all damage dealt by 6%. All attacks that cost focus will refund 1 focus when used. In addition, taking damage generates 1 focus, but this effect cannot occur more than once every 6 seconds.
Blade Storm has a 50% chance to cause the target to burn for (current weapon) damage over 6 seconds.
Blade Storm has a 100% chance to cause the target to burn for (current weapon) damage over 12 seconds.
Force Sweep no longer costs focus.
Reduces the cooldown of Overhead Slash by 2 and Blade Storm by 1.
Reduces the cooldown of Overhead Slash by 4 and Blade Storm by 2.
Reduces the cooldown of Overhead Slash by 6 and Blade Storm by 3.
Generates 1 additional focus when taking area effect damage while Shien Form is active.
Increases total Endurance by 50%. In addition, Guardian Leap has a 2% chance of applying its effect to you as well.
Increases total Endurance by 100%. In addition, Guardian Leap has a 4% chance of applying its effect to you as well.
Overhead Slash has a 50% chance to set the target ablaze for (current weapon) elemental damage over 6 seconds.
Overhead Slash has a 100% chance to set the target ablaze for (current weapon) elemental damage over 6 seconds.
Executes an acrobatic attack that deals (current weapon) weapon damage.
Overhead Slash and Plasma Brand have a 50% chance to increase the critical hit chance of Blade Storm and Dispatch by 60% for 9 seconds.
Overhead Slash and Plasma Brand have a 100% chance to increase the critical hit chance of Blade Storm and Dispatch by 60% for 9 seconds.
Reduces all damage taken by 2%. Additionally reduces the cooldown of Awe by 7.5.
Reduces all damage taken by 4%. Additionally reduces the cooldown of Awe by 15.

Overhead Slash and Plasma Brand have a 10% chance to finish the cooldown on Master Strike. This effect cannot occur more than once every 15 seconds. Each rank beyond the first reduces this rate limit by 3 seconds.

Overhead Slash and Plasma Brand have a 20% chance to finish the cooldown on Master Strike. This effect cannot occur more than once every 15 seconds. Each rank beyond the first reduces this rate limit by 3 seconds.

Overhead Slash and Plasma Brand have a 30% chance to finish the cooldown on Master Strike. This effect cannot occur more than once every 15 seconds. Each rank beyond the first reduces this rate limit by 3 seconds.
Engulfs your lightsaber in fiery plasma, striking a target affected by Sundering Strike for (current weapon) elemental damage, and deals a further (current weapon) elemental damage over 12 seconds.
Increases the duration of Force Leap's immobilize effect by 0.5.
Increases the duration of Force Leap's immobilize effect by 1.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Force attacks by 2%.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Force attacks by 4%.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Force attacks by 6%.
Reduces the cooldown of Master Strike by 5 and Force Stasis by 1.5.
Reduces the cooldown of Master Strike by 10 and Force Stasis by 3.
Increases the critical strike chance of Slash by 7.5%.
Increases the critical strike chance of Slash by 15%.
You now generate 1 focus when attacked in Shii-Cho Form. This effect cannot occur more than once every 6 seconds.
Reduces the cooldown of all Force abilities while in Shii-Cho Form by 1.5.
Reduces the cooldown of all Force abilities while in Shii-Cho Form by 3.
Resolute has a 50% chance to heal you for 10% of your maximum health.
Resolute has a 100% chance to heal you for 10% of your maximum health.
Reduces the pushback suffered while channeling Force Stasis by 50%.
Reduces the pushback suffered while channeling Force Stasis by 100%.
Leaps to a target, stabbing it for (current weapon) weapon damage. Strikes with both weapons if dual wielding.
Increases the damage dealt by Slash and Zealous Leap by 3%.
Increases the damage dealt by Slash and Zealous Leap by 6%.
Each tick of Force Stasis and Force Exhaustion grants you Singularity, increasing the damage your next Force Sweep deals by 12.5%. Stacks up to 4 times.
Each tick of Force Stasis and Force Exhaustion grants you Singularity, increasing the damage your next Force Sweep deals by 25%. Stacks up to 4 times.
Force Leap and Zealous Leap have a 50% chance to make your next Sweep used within 15 seconds an automatic critical hit.
Force Leap and Zealous Leap have a 100% chance to make your next Sweep used within 15 seconds an automatic critical hit.
Combat Focus immediately grants 1 additional focus.
Combat Focus immediately grants 2 additional focus.
While in Shii-Cho Form, your attacks ignore 10% of your targets' armor.
While in Shii-Cho Form, your attacks ignore 20% of your targets' armor.
Increases movement speed by 20% for 5 seconds after using Zealous Leap.
Increases movement speed by 40% for 10 seconds after using Zealous Leap.
Reduces the focus cost of all movement-slowing effects by 1.
Lowers the cooldown of Saber Throw by 2.5 seconds and causes Saber Throw to apply 1 of sunder armor to the target.
Lowers the cooldown of Saber Throw by 5 seconds and causes Saber Throw to apply 2 of sunder armor to the target.
Increases the critical strike damage of all Force attacks by 10%.
Increases the critical strike damage of all Force attacks by 20%.
Increases the critical strike damage of all Force attacks by 30%.

Progressively slows the target from 60% to 10% movement speed over 5 and deals (current weapon) kinetic damage each second. At the end of the duration, the target is crushed and takes an additional (current weapon) kinetic damage.
